content.rendered:
Tuition costs and a comprehensive list of fees for graduate students.

Note: Not all fees may apply.

Tuition

 

 

M.Ed., Educational Leadership, Preliminary Administrative Services Credential, Professional Administrative Services Credential, per semester hour $740
Credential program in the LaFetra College of Education, Bilingual Authorization, per semester hour $300
Credential program in the LaFetra College of Education, Clear Administrative Services, per semester hour $450
LaFetra College of Education, CBO/School Business Management Certificate, per certificate $7500
Credential program in the LaFetra College of Education, Health Education for Educators, per semester hour $150
Credential program in the LaFetra College of Education, Preliminary Administrative Services, per semester hour $300
Master’s Degree and Credential program in the LaFetra College of Education, per semester hour $800
Master of Science in School Psychology, per semester hour $800
Master’s Degree in Athletic Training, per semester hour $745
Master of Science Physician Assistant Practice, per trimester (Admitted Fall 2023)
 $16,105
Master of Science Physician Assistant Practice, per trimester (Admitted Fall 2022) $16,525
Master of Science Physician Assistant Practice, per trimester (Admitted Fall 2020)
 $15,855
Master’s Degree in the College of Arts and Sciences (Marriage and Family Therapy), per semester hour $915
Master’s Degrees in the College of Business (Business Admin, Accounting, Finance, and Leadership & Management, Data Analytics), per semester hour $935
Master’s Degrees in the College of Business (Health Admin, and Public Admin), per semester hour $785
Master’s Degree (Active duty military rate), per semester hour $385
Doctor of Business Administration (D.B.A), Doctor of Psychology (Psy.D.), per semester hour $1,275
Doctor of Public Administration (D.P.A.), Doctor of Education in Organizational Leadership (Ed.D.), per semester hour $1,235

Fees

APA fee (doctoral students) $100
Appeals $50
Application, doctoral $75
Application, master’s and credential $50
Assessment Testing Kit Fee $50
Auditing, per semester hour one-half normal tuition
Authentication Certificate (Apostille) $80-$110
Cap and Gown Fee (doctoral students) $80
Competency Exam (COB) $150
Continuous Registration, doctoral (PsyD, Ed.D, D.B.A & D.P.A), 1-2 semester hours of tuition $1,235-$2,550
Course Challenge one semester hour of tuition
Deferred Payment Plan Fee, per semester $75
Deferred Payment Plan Fee, summer $50
Dissertation completion $450
Graduation, doctoral $300
Graduation, master’s $160
Health Center Fee (mandatory for all international graduate students, per semester $75
Insurance Medical Services Fee,  (mandatory for all international graduate students) per semester  $690
Insurance Medical Services Fee,  (mandatory for all new international graduate students) for summer and/or fall or spring session 2 enrollment only $345
Late Financial Arrangement $100-300
Lost (Replacement) ID card $5
Make-Up Examinations $40
Missed Payment Fee $35
MSAT Multipurpose Fee (per year)

MSAT CPR & AED

MSAT Board of Certification Practicum Exam

MSAT Live Scan

MSAT Mini-medical kit with supplies

MSAT NATA Dues & ATRACK Access

MSAT Professional Attire/Uniform

 $1,000
Physician Assistant-fee for program related costs, per semester

Registration Fee, per course

 $915

$30
Returned Check/Rejected Credit Card $25
RICA Test Preparation Fee $100
Student Public Administration Fee $75
Student Tuition Deposit (non-refundable)* $200
Taskstream Account Misuse Fee $27-70
Teacher Performance Assessment (TPA) $50-100
Teacher Performance Assessment (TPA) Late Fee $50-100
Transcript, per copy $12
Transcript sent certified mail, per copy $15
Transcript (23-hour turn around), per copy $20
Transcript (special handling/request), per copy $35

* These fees are not applicable to all programs.
